title: Simple Answers
alt: 'Will [     ] allow us to better understand each other and thus make war undesirable?' is one that pops up whenever we invent a new communication medium.
transcript:
[Caption above the chart:]
The simple answers to the questions that get asked about every new technology:

Will [ ] make us all geniuses?
No


Will [ ] make us all morons?
No


Will [ ] destroy whole industries?
Yes


Will [ ] make us more empathetic?
No


Will [ ] make us less caring?
No


Will teens use [ ] for sex?
Yes


Were they going to have sex anyway?
Yes


Will [ ] destroy music?
No


Will [ ] destroy art?
No


But can't we go back to a time when-
No


Will [ ] bring about world peace?
No


Will [ ] cause widespreadalienation by creating a worldof empty experiences?
We werealreadyalienated
